edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class GeoAlarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.GeoAlarm

  • public class GeoAlarm
extends Activity
    The main Activity for the GeoAlarm app When the app is launched, this Activity sets the content view to main, and initializes the primary UI elements.

        This method gets the tare data values for the session, and stores them in the DB

      • showMapScreen

        public void showMapScreen(View view)
        This method is called when the Map button is clicked. It launches the RouteMap activity. We use the onClick XML attribute in main.xml to bind the method to the click event.

      • showTripScreen

        public void showTripScreen(View view)
        This method is called when the Trip button is clicked. It launches the TripPlanner activity. We use the onClick XML attribute in main.xml to bind the method to the click event.
        Parameters:
        view - The button that was clicked
